caption: Delicious! All you can eat! Handy tablet at each tabletop to order with. You can even use it to request more napkins, refills of your drink and the check when you're done. You need to save room for the desserts. The shaved ice amd black sugar pudding was great.
The broth is rich and delicious, the service is fast, order is by iPad, all you can: meat, veg, soda, wings, dessert, soda, noodles....
官网订餐没有取消和修改选项，打电话无数遍都没有人接……
The broth is amazing
Great staff great food fun time
First time at a Hot Pot style restaurant,  was a Very good experience.
Not fresh as they just open especially seafoods. And they also changed some types of food, like sausage. Don’t know if it’s a temporary change or not. But the base soups are good though.
Mushroom broth and spice broth were really good. Sodas are free. Foods are fresh. YUM!

Went here for the first time this evening.  I have eaten quite a bit of hot pot (火锅) in the area and I have to say I was amazed by this place for the following reasons:  1.  Excellent Customer Service 2.  Great Food Quality 3.  Excellent Selection Choices of Broth 4.  Convenient Technology for Ordering  I will definitely be back; and despite living in Northern Virginia, I will make the hike to come back with my friends.  Kudos to the HOT POT CITY Team!
Great food!!!
Great place. I’ve been ordering through Uber eats since the lockdown and the quality has been consistent.  They package the meat/veggies raw upon request which is great.

I had a really good first time experience here. The staff were all super friendly and attentive. Even had someone walked around offering us ladies a hairband. The prices were also fair for lunch, though I was disappointed that shrimp paste was extra. Other than that, they had shaved ice and this brown sugar jelly thing for dessert, which is different than the typical sago they serve at other hot pot places. Overall totally recommend this place and would come again!
Good hot pot restaurant, a little bit pricy tho

To be honest, pretty disappointed at the fried chicken wings. It always has been so good! Now, after pandemic, finally we are so excited to go get food,  but it taste way worse than before! Not flavored at all… I won’t go anymore…

The foods were okay but the shrimp was not fresh. I feel like many foods weren’t as fresh compared to coming here in the past. It really irritated me when one of the female waitress had to ask me for extra tips. I didn’t feel like their service was really good to the point I had to give the amount they WANTED. I came in the past and it was so much better! There was a custom part for tips but then I was told I had to give a specific amount which really made me upset. Don’t want to come here anymore because that was just really disrespectful.
Adding an automatic gratuity is completely unacceptable for anyone. And to need to ask multiple times for things. There are other choices.

Missed my hot pot while being in the lockdown. I have been here for more than I could count so had to visit it right after it reopened and time for me to write this review. The restaurant is a all you can eat in two hours hotpot heaven. The process is extreally fast and efficient. There is a tablet on the table for you to select all the ingredients. Remember to select your soup base first in which you will cook your own food in (if you are into spicy food they have some real hotties). Then you can select all the food you will to eat ranging from meat to viggies. The soup will come in a pot which is placed over a hot top. The ingredients will come raw and you place them into the boiling soup to cook. While you are waiting for your food to be cook, remember to visit the sauce station. They have everything to give you food that punch in your mouth. I have been to many hot pot places in New York, San Francisco, and the DMV area. This is a great place that you can never go wrong with. (FYI too busy eating so I forgot to take pictures but I will visit again soon! And hopefully not forget)
Excellent hotpot, both eat-in and to-go!
Very clean and well managed. Probably the best hot pot I've been to in Maryland.
Food is good, decor is nice

All you can eat. Great food. Good price. This is a popular high tech version of a traditional hot pot restaurant. The facility is spotless. The fixed price basic menu has a great variety of good things to add to your personal hot pot. The lunch is  great deal! It's always busy, so call ahead to get a place in the queue.

The food was amazing and plentiful flowed like a river allmost. But the service was a bit pestering we tried to share one broth between 2 peapol but they insisted on everyone who was there to pay everything the same. I guess that makes sense perhaps their paying for the seat, but still a bit of warning would have been nice. Other than that little thing it's a great place and I would recommend just dont be afraid to ask questions and be hypervilligent. (Allso spicy is super hot even when set to low spice)
Friendly staff. Great selection of food and nice ambience.

If you can eat spicy, try their signature spicy soup. Good service, fresh ingredients, very tasty. If you decide to go on weekend, don’t forget to call first. I arrived around 4 pm but still waited for 35 minuets. Definitely recommend their dessert, really good restaurant to hangout with friends
Very nice all you can eat hotpot. Authentic Chinese hot pot, also have milk tea for purchase. Would definitely recommend it

My friends and I drove 1 hour from DC just for the authentic taste. The food was fresh and great, staff and services are excellent.  If there’s anything I suggest to improve,I would say the meal duration and Pre-meal services. We made a reservation at 5 pm on a windy and freezing Friday. Their door stay locked until 5 o’clock even the customers standing outside the restaurant in the cold wind and are able to see the staff sitting inside and waiting through the glass. I understand it is policy and the staff don’t do what they are not paying for. But it doesn’t hurt if they just open the door and let us keep warm.  Second, the meal time limit is 2 hours. I understand it is out of restaurant profits. I recommend the staff could kindly remind the customer 15 min before their time’s up so they could be mindful about the time. It is a shame I missed the shaved ice and it is a pain to go back again since I live 1 hour driving distance away.  Overall, the place is great! My friends and I really enjoyed the atmosphere and we had a wonderful time! Definitely recommend to anyone who wants an authentic bite of Chinese cuisine.

Really wish I could give this place a zero! Was told 1 hour wait time. I stand at the doorway, for an hour, and wait and watch people who came in after me being seated. I approach the guy at the front counter again and I am  told another 30 minutes.Seriously? As I l’m looking at him show 2 more groups..same size as mine.. to open tables. If you’re thinking about going out to a hot pot restaurant..GO SOMEWHERE ELSE! DON’T WASTE YOUR TIME HERE!!  Oh did I mention I saw waiters dropping things in the kitchen, picking it up and places it on the trays?!? Yeah! Happy not to recommend this place to anyone!

Great selection of meats and vegetables. Also includes some dessert options! Shaved ice with fruit is a good one. Service is very prompt and polite, but always expect a line during dinner hours. Their bubble tea is just ok; there are a lot better options around the area.
One of the Best hot pot in DMV
One of the best hot pot in the DMV area
Very nice hot pot
Excellent 👌
(Translated by Google) Delicious ah 😯  (Original) 好吃的啊😯
(Translated by Google) Remember salt and tomato pot  (Original) 番茄鍋記得少鹽

Your "senior advisor" -- Yet another AYCE, hot pot restaurant.  Basically same thinly sliced, rolled, frozen, healthy food.  Your choice of brothes, meat, veggies, seafood, and a collection of herbs and spices to choose from.  Some places have staff carrying tablets to place your order.  Most others have a tablet on your table, as this place does.  We had been told by friends, that are more appropriate to the rest of the clientele, that this place is better that others.  So we had to go try it.  Being on a "protein and salad" diet, they didn't even have any lettuce.  But they did have "Napa cabbage", that sorta worked.  While some restaurants charge you per drink, these hot pots give refills.  This place actually gave you cans of soda, unlimited.  And as other of these places that we have tried, and there are a bunch, if you get there and you see a line, look for another place.  There is a two hour time limit, and time goes by very quickly as you are concentrating on all of the options you have.  Perhaps not so quick while you are waiting for a table.  Admitting that this was our first time THERE, they were incredibly helpful, and explained everything.  Just that their interpretation of less "spicy", and mine, is vastly different.  I'm going for a less spicy broth next time.  We'll definitely be back.  So many places, so many choices, all basically the same.  Hot pot.  Now throw in BBQ grill and that's another adventure.
Great service and very unique experience
The BEST hot pot in DC area

Great hot pot place!  Let me share a tip.  Park at the garage right across from the Rockville Memorial lib.  The lib validates for 2 hours of free parking.  And even if you go over the free 2 hours, it's only $2 extra an hour and the validation of 2 hours still work!
Horribly rude service.  Food is ok if you want to be treated badly.

(Translated by Google) Service is good, but I give a star I took my family and two children to dinner, and after 20 minutes of my order, no one served me food until I found a service person to ask about it and responded to me with a system failure. This explanation is hard to convince me, because I ordered the bottom of the pan in my order, but did not give me other dishes. And long hair was found in the subsequent smoothies, unhygienic. 30 minutes after serving, the service staff came over and told me that their kitchen was going to work and let me make the final order. To be honest, I have never given any hot pot restaurant such a bad review, but I made such a review today, and I hope that everyone will not have such encounters as I do. I just hope that the store can do better, but I don't think I will go to this hot pot restaurant again. I thought I would get better food and feel when I chose the most expensive lunch hotpot, but I was wrong. There are many cheaper hotpots here and the food is relatively better. I hope everyone will carefully screen.  (Original) 服务很不错，但我给一颗星 我带着我的家人和两个孩子去吃饭，在我下的订单20分钟之后，没有人给我上菜，直到我找到了服务人员来询问这个事情，给我答复是系统故障。这个解释很难让我相信，因为我在订单中的锅底给我上了，却没有给我其他的菜。并且在后来的冰沙中发现了长头发，不卫生。上菜之后30分钟服务人员过来告诉我，他们的厨房要下班了，让我做最后的下单。讲真的，我从来没有给任何火锅店如此差的评价，但我今天做出了这样的评价，我希望大家能够不要像我一样有这样的遭遇，我只是希望店家可以做得更好，但是我想我自己不会再去这个火锅店了。本以为我选择了最贵的午餐火锅会获得更好的食物和感受，但是我错了，有很多比这里便宜的火锅并且食物相对也比这里好。希望大家仔细甄别。

The food is delicious, and the concept is so much fun. You can order virtually unlimited meat, fish, tofu, and other additions to your hot pot, and pick things off the revolving table. A distinctive experience.  Go with a friend, especially on a cold fall/ winter day!
Not much seasoning in the food
Ridiculous queue cutting rules, table for 4 will override table for 1-3.  The yelp waitlist order is meaningless.

This is my new favorite AYCE hot pot place in the DMV area! Because of the price point ($28/person), I wasn’t attracted to try this place. I finally got to visit this place last weekend and loved the whole experience! Before visiting, I suggest checking the live wait time on Yelp.  My highlights: 1. Delicious spicy broth! (Caution: Regular spicy level is already quite spicy) 2. Premium quality food 3. Great service - you almost never have to ask for refills or etc. They timely come to check on your table
ONE OF MY FAVORITE RESTAURANTS HANDS DOWN!
Not bad for me.
food was not fresh all all! I wished I didn’t go there and should have checked other reviews first! My friend and I both had serious diarrhea after having a dinner here last Sunday.
The broth is delicious.  Ample selection for all you can eat.

(Translated by Google) I really like the hot pot restaurant, I want to eat every few days, although there is no main dish like the duck belly in Chongqing hot pot, but the spicy taste is good, finally eat away from home to be more authentic Chongqing hot pot. Will continue to frequent!  (Original) 个人非常喜欢的火锅店，每隔几天就想去吃，虽然没有重庆火锅必点的毛肚鸭肠之类的主菜，但麻辣味道还是不错，总算在远离家乡的地方吃到比较正宗的重庆火锅了。还会继续经常光顾的！

Authentic Chinese hot pot with endless variety and excellent service. Go early. It gets crazy busy.  The house broth was too spicy for me(and I like spicy) but loved the mushroom broth.  Sauces available for dipping were great
food is good. easy to reorder items. wait can be long to get seated on the weekends.
Great all you can eat for lunch hot POT. Very spicy if desired. Soup base was Great but beef/lamb slices were flaky, good intestines abd tripe.
Like heaven

Well smack my back and call me Betty!!!! This place is THE place to go eat. The place is one of a kind. You get to decide what broth you want, what choices of meat you want such as shrimp, lamb, beef as well as other choices. You also can create your own dipping sauce from a lovely variety of choices such as chili oil, peanut oil, and about 10 others. You can then go to the dry section to continue creating your own dipping sauce which has an amazing variety to choose from such as cilantro, peanuts, and many others. The broth is fabulous which they will allow you to take home so long as it is just broth....no meat. The staff are friendly, the place is clean; including  the bathrooms, and the food is great. The customers consist mostly of Asian decent which is a very good thing because that is a clear indicator that the place is the real deal. You can not go wrong at this fabulous restaurant. Enjoy🤗!!!!

This is my hot pot go-to place. Both me and my boyfriend love  it a lot! Fresh ingredients, super nice service and variety of food selections! Love their Ice pudding and their extra extra spicy broth! Must try!

Worst worst ever! I got a serious food poisoning after had lunch there yesterday, and that is so horrible, vomiting and diarrhea all night last night till today, and I gotta take my day off from work as well. I already called food and safety department of county, hopefully they could help find out what their problem behind the kitchen!
Excellent service. IPad app is laggy.
okay to try and enjoy
Great service the food is good. The hot pots are little smaller than what I'm used to. So if you split the broth it's kind of hard to take things out.
Good. But if you come in rush hour, need to wait more than 40 mins.
very good
Amazing food you've got to try it
eh not great compared to other places. Walked out after looking at their options. Hot pot legend was not great either and not worth the wait.
Excellent food and service!
The food is fresh and the decoration is trendy! Perfect place to have authentic Chinese hot pot and hang out with friends!

Nice environment, authentic flavor, varieties of vegetables, meat, and seafood. Some beverages and desserts are even included in the buffet price, very good deal. Good spot for friends/family gathering.
Great place for groups! Has a wide variety of meats, vegetables and desserts!!
Nice restaurant for group party. And kids friendly! Lots free side dish and dessert! Love it!
good environment, fresh food, best Choice for people who love spicy food

Place was clean and had good typical hotpot selections. Service was fast and friendly. You can also order entrees at an additional charge. I also liked  how they offer aprons and hair ties for the girls. It's these little touches like this that makes a huge difference with the overall experience.

(Translated by Google) I can eat authentic Chongqing hot pot in the United States, and my wife is too warm! ! It is highly recommended that you like small hot pots, don't miss it. In addition, the decoration in the store is also very particular about it, the details seem to return to the country.  (Original) 能在美国吃到正宗的重庆火锅，真的太太太暖心了！！强烈推荐喜欢小火锅的吃货们，一定不要错过。另外店里的装修也很讲究呢，细节之处仿佛回到国内。
Excellent food and service!  Always come back to this place whenever thinking of hot pot.
Good!
Delicious food with a great and easy experience. Staff was really friendly and explained the restaurant very well. Great lunch deal and a fun experience!

the manage is out of order，waitting 1.5 hour，horrible service. When we got a table, they said they are about to close. We have to finish within half an hour and cannot order any more. Drive 40 miles for the hotpot city. Very disappointed!

(Translated by Google) I remembered the days when I was eating hot pot in Chongqing. It is quite satisfying to be able to eat this taste in the United States! The decoration in the store is also very hard, it is said that the craftsmen of Chongqing have done it by hand! Personal favorite shrimp slip! (The subwoofer in the store is also very good service)  (Original) 想起了在重庆吃火锅的日子，能在美国吃到这个味道已经相当知足了！店里的装修也是蛮用心，据说是重庆的手艺人手工做的！个人最爱虾滑！ （店里的低音炮小哥哥服务也很好）
(Translated by Google) Not bad, very good  (Original) 不错不错👍很好吃
Very Excellent Tasting Natural Authentic Chinese Food. Good Customer Service. I just didnt like the fact it has no Poultry Selections except for Hard Dried Out 2 Chicken Wings.

(Translated by Google) The tomato pot is delicious and tastes very fragrant. The serving speed is fast and the dishes are quite fresh. Good service attitude. Spicy pot smells good. Simi dew is also delicious. recommend.  (Original) 番茄锅很好吃，味道很香。上菜速度快，菜品挺新鲜的。服务态度好。麻辣锅闻着味道不错。西米露也好喝哦。推荐。
We waited 90 mi

Well, as a person who actually grew up in Chong Qing, I can tell you that fatty beef pot and the veggie pot is not hot pot AT ALL! The Chong Qing Cold Noodle is the right taste but the ingredients are wrong. I never saw an egg in Chong Qing Cold Noodle in my life before. Food in the pot is too salty. The waiter are friendly. Finally, I have to say their ordering App is bad design from a developer perspective.

Disappointed....first time here and the food look just sad. They have this beef pot on the menu, thought it is a set portion mini pot (which is common in other hotpot place), but it came out to be this bowl of mixed stuff...little pieces of everything and it’s way too salty. The veggie plates on the belt don’t seem fresh. Saw a couple flies around too. The waiters are friendly, just wish they explained better for the menu.
Love it
(Translated by Google) Chengdu specialty hot pot, jelly and shaved ice 🍧 are delicious  (Original) 成都特色火锅，凉粉和刨冰🍧很好吃

(Translated by Google) Hot pot is good, there are common ingredients. However, I was very dissatisfied with the female manager at the front desk and the service attitude was very poor. We ordered a soy bean curd during the meal, and later found that it was obviously out of date, I wanted to propose the restaurant to pay attention to the quality of the food. The female manager immediately retorted that the ingredients were just bought from a nearby supermarket. There was no food quality problem and refused to apologize. The female manager apparently did not know that the supermarket was a well-known "dwelling point" for selling expired foods. It was very insensitive to food safety, neglecting existing problems, and could not beat the responsibility of any restaurant manager to serve customers well!  I have collected samples and complained to the Maryland Health Department. I also want to suggest that you carefully consider this restaurant when planning a banquet. If you really want to eat, be cautious and refuse expired food.  In case you have a problem, you are looking for a boss to defend your rights, or are you going to experience how they cook? Who knows?  (To the restaurant owner: The original star is not willing to give it, but the one star is given to other waiters in your restaurant. I am very satisfied with the positive and considerate service of other young waiters. Finally, in order to ensure the prosperity of business in the future, it is recommended. Immediately abolish the front desk manager!)  (Original) 火锅不错，常见食材都有。但是对前台女经理非常不满意，服务态度很差。我们在就餐时点了一份油豆腐泡，后来发现明显过期，就想提议餐厅注意食品质量。女经理立即反驳说食材是从附近某超市刚买来的，不存在食品质量问题，拒绝道歉。女经理显然不知道那个超市是出了名的销售过期食品的“窝点”，对食品安全非常不敏感，忽视存在的问题，完全无法胜任一位餐厅经理服务好顾客的职责！  我已经采集样本并向马里兰卫生部门投诉了，同时也想建议大家计划宴会时慎重考虑此餐馆，若真在此就餐要谨慎，拒绝过期食品。  万一吃出问题，你找老板维权，还是打算体验他们如何甩锅，谁知道呢？  （致餐厅老板：原本一颗星也不愿给，但给的一颗星是送给贵餐厅其他服务员的，我对其他年轻服务员积极周到地服务非常满意。最后，为保日后生意兴隆，建议立即裁撤前台女经理！）
Very good! Never had a hot pot before and the servers were very attentive and explained the process. So good food and good service. Will be returning
(Translated by Google) The sauce tastes good  (Original) 酱料味道很好
Friendly staff. Super helpful, great food. Will be going again soon!

(Translated by Google) The price is very cheap, very delicious, and the lunch is discounted. It feels very cool. It is best to come in advance, and the meal time often needs to be lined up.  (Original) 价格便宜，非常好吃，午餐打折，感觉挺爽。最好提前来，就餐时间经常需要排队

The food came in VERY small portion for 4 people. And my friend literally threw up after eating there and this city is by far the worst hot pot place I’ve been to in my entire life. Sauces are not specific described. Although the service was great. Food quality needs a big improvement
Fresh foods and good service. The dessert selection is a gem.
The service was so nice! Also the food is.

An awesome experience. Great all you can eat deal, endless options and bubble tea. Very attentive staff, and super fresh product.  Being able to order on your own tables tablet was convinent. I will be going back again!
very bad. No meat. vegan hot pot
Food is not fresh

The environment is very soothing and all the food looks delicious 😋. Had the Sichuan Noodle Bowl and it was very fresh and flavorful. Will try to go back to try the Hot Pot special as it seems very interesting.
Very good hotpot. Will visit again.

First time there we had good experience, so we decided to come back.  Well this time we were told by one of the waitress that 15% tip is mandatory. My tip was just a bit short of that, because I gave tip based on food, not AFTER tax.  I would've been ok with what she said if it was because of the size of our party. BUT she said it's just mandatory, and even for 1 person, it's still 15% regardless.  I knew she was dishonest on the latter because that was clearly not the case when we came the first time.  That was disappointing and if I see some clarification from the management I will consider updating my rating.
Service (one of the best experience I've ever had) 5/5, soup base 5/5, source bay 5/5, meat 4/5, seafood 3/5, beef ball 2/5, vegitable 4/5
Really good. Food is fresh. Pot is full of flavor. Very authentic. Good dessert.
Very good food but a bit pricy.
Taste is below average but good service and lots of options. You’ll probably find better broth in other hotpot places in Rockville.
Best in this area
pork brain is the best！
Love it

A great hot pot place with varied foods and drinks!  Firstly, they have different kinds of delicious soup bases. We tried their signature spicy soup and pickled sour soup and they both are really yummy!!  Secondly, Meats and seafoods are freshly prepared and their service is quick and nice! They also have free coke and sprite included in “ all you can eat”. They have great dipping sauces at your choice as well!
Not bad, but there are equivalent hot pot restaurants in the area which are a better deal.

他們把最道地的重慶火鍋重現在Rockville. 食材很新鮮. 再加上我個人非常喜歡麻辣鍋，相當推薦！ ！！ OK this is not only the best Hot Pot in the DC area, this is world class and will stand up to the best you can find in China. They also have fast lunch option noodle bowl and best bubble tea around.  Lucky us they brought the best spicy numbing ChongQing flavor here.  The all-you-can-eat is such a great value. So many options to choose from and they are all very good. Everything I try was amazing. The meat, vegetables, tofu, seafood are all very fresh and homemade! The soup base has amazing flavor and depth - nothing overdone- everything just right. Besides the spicy broth the non spicy options like pickled vegetable are amazing as well. Sometime I'll get the split pot just to have different flavor.  Besides the Hot Pot they will have bubble tea and special authentic Chinese noodle options if you need a quick lunch during the week.  Go try it now! You'll be very happy!

Hot pot and service were really good. Meat, seafood, broth qualities were excellent. I chose one of the spicy broths and even though it was very good, i was hoping to change it to a less spicy option. The server had no issues and actually brought me a separate pot with non spicy broths.  Sodas and teas are included and there are also four complimentary dessert choices.  Best parking option is probably straight ahead on Maryland Ave into the Rockville Center Garage which is $2 flat fee on evenings and weekends. Don’t have to worry about how long your meal takes.
Delicious, fresh ingredients, tasty soup base, will definitely come back!
We asked for spicy and we got spicy...

(Translated by Google) Never let go of any hot pot restaurant, 5:30 traffic jam time dedicated to VA for an hour to eat, Wednesday night even saw a few tables lined up, can be a leader in all u can eat.  (Original) 从不放过任何一家火锅店，5点半堵车时间专门从VA开了一个小时来吃的，周三的晚上竟然还看到几桌排队的，在all u can eat里面可以占个佼佼者。
(Translated by Google) The newly opened hot pot restaurant, self-service, good environment.  (Original) 新开的火锅店，自助，环境不错。
Most authentic hotpot near DC area.

Authentic hot pot!! This is the most authentic hot pot you can have in the DMV area. Spicy beef oil soup base is very nice and spicy. The food are fresh. You can tell from the shininess of the meat. Service is also great they carefully pour the soup base and make sure it’s not spilling on you. Food delivery is fast and generous. Ordering is easy with iPad. Will definitely go again and recommend this place!

A cannot miss place! Excellent Hotpot buffet. Soup base is the best around Rockville. I highly recommend to come back and try different soup bases. Lots of options for foods, we got a lot of meat and fresh vegetables. They are all at good quality.  Appetizers, soda and desert are free! Service is nice, place is clean. Sauce bar is great too!
Must try! Best hot pot in the MDV area. The food is fresh and tasty. In addition to that, they have excellent customer service Again, MUST TRY !

I was at the soft opening yesterday, I had the spicy and my friend got the double flavor. The stock base is authentic and comparable to riverside, much superior than any other hot pot places in the area.  The choices are grand, most  Szechuan  hotpot favorite ingredients are available without upcharges. If you get the all you can eat, soda, snacks like pancake and xlb, dessert include the clear jello which is my favorite are all FREE!  The decoration is very pretty, details reminiscing Szechuan region art and components. they will be rolling out liquor and bubble tea drinks soon, looking forward next time to try the pickled cabbage stock, yum😍
(Translated by Google) Punch card red shop! ! The noodles and hot pot are so delicious! Highly recommended😘😘  (Original) 打卡网红店！！面和火锅🍲太好吃！强烈推荐😘😘
(Translated by Google) Very authentic Chongqing hot pot. The more spicy the pan, the more delicious it is, the more delicious it tastes! Recommended  (Original) 非常正宗的重庆火锅。麻辣锅越吃越好吃，味道越熬越香！值得推荐
